revised_prompt: Please generate a professional banner advertisement with dimensions of 1200x628 pixels for a technology store's Black Friday sale. The style should be modern, clean and have a professional advertising tone. The layout should be simple and uncluttered, with the text being the focal point of the design. Use sans-serif fonts, maintain high contrast for legibility and ensure the brand prominence is clear with the name 'TechStore' being the largest element on the banner. The Call-to-action (CTA) 'Shop Now' should be apparent with the help of a brightly colored button. Adhere to a color scheme which is professional, vibrant, eye-catching, with a clean or subtle background that does not interfere in the readability of the text. 'TechStore' should be located at the top or center and be the biggest and boldest, 'Up to 70% Off' should be a secondary focus with a medium size in the center area, 'Shop Now' should be at a prominent position, preferably bottom. Ensure that the text is crystal clear, easy to read, and of high professional quality, avoiding decorative text, extra words or complex patterns behind the text.
